'''Masuku''' is an event-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event.

==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Masuku takes the form of a young man with shoulder-length olive hair. He wears a blue fox mask, an orange {{w|happi}}, black arm sleeves, striped brown pants, and sandals.

==Event Dialogue==
===Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival===
====Dialogue Set #1====
''Available between completing [[As Though Caught in a Dream]] and [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Masuku near the "Akitsu Harpastum" booth)
:'''Masuku:''' Hoohoo, [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival/Akitsu Harpastum: Dreams Doubled|Akitsu Harpastum]] sure is fun! ... Now, if only more people could play it with me...
{{Dialogue End}}

====Dialogue Set #2====
''Available after completing [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''{{Verify}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Masuku near the "Akitsu Harpastum" booth)
:'''Masuku:''' Huh, so nightmares are to blame for there being less people around to play with? Bah, what killjoys!
{{Dialogue End}}
